configFileTemplateContent:
global:
  scrape_interval: ${global_config.global_scrape}
  evaluation_interval: ${global_config.global_evaluation}
alerting:
  alertmanagers:
    - static_configs:
      - targets:
rule_files:
scrape_configs:
<#list targets as target>
  - job_name: '${target.jobName}'
    metrics_path: ${target.metrics_path}
    scrape_interval: ${target.scrape_interval}
    static_configs:
    - targets: [<#list target.Addresses as address>'${address.ipAddress}'<#sep>,</#list>]
<#if target.Labels?has_content>      labels:
<#list target.Labels as labels>        ${labels.label_name}: ${labels.label_value}<#sep>
</#list></#if><#sep>
</#list>
